categories.title: Liber Necrophilia
categories.preview: a historical and psychological study of erotic attraction to corpses, from ancient ritual to modern pathology

categories.title: Liber Zoophilia
categories.preview: an exploration of human-animal sexual relationships across cultures and time, examining both taboo and acceptance

categories.title: Liber Sodomorum
categories.preview: a cross-cultural examination of sexual practices labeled deviant, with a focus on male-male relations in antiquity and religious law

categories.title: Liber Experimentorum
categories.preview: a dark chronicle of human and animal experimentation, detailing the ethics, horrors, and legacy of scientific cruelty

categories.title: Liber Mortis
categories.preview: an anthropological descent into death rituals, corpse treatment, and the aesthetics of human decay

categories.title: Liber Incubi
categories.preview: a demonological dossier on nocturnal sexual spirits, incubus folklore, and the blurring of mysticism and psychosis

categories.title: Liber Hysterica
categories.preview: a clinical and cultural genealogy of female madness, from ancient womb theories to asylum-era misogyny

categories.title: Malleus Innocentium
categories.preview: a sobering investigation into the historical abuse of children by institutions cloaked in sanctity

categories.title: Fabrica Excruciationis
categories.preview: a mechanical and symbolic analysis of instruments of pain, built to punish, extract, or purify through suffering
